title: Fragment, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, silver foil, silk core wrapped with silver foil
Technique: compound twill, supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Gold-colored silk ground with extra weft of flat silver strips. Symmetrical design of swinging acanthus branches enclosing palmettes which are brocaded in silver thread. White silk extra weft appears in acanthus foliage areas.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: silk, silver foil, silk core wrapped with silver foil
Technique: compound twill, supplementary weft. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1896-1-118.
